thread.title: Lumos Networks to Present at Financial Conferences in November of 2015
thread.title_full: Lumos Networks to Present at Financial Conferences in November of 2015

author: admin
title: Lumos Networks to Present at Financial Conferences in November of 2015
text:
Lumos Networks Corp. 
WAYNESBORO, Va. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Lumos Networks Corp. (“Lumos Networks” or the “Company”) (Nasdaq: LMOS), a leading fiber-based provider of data, voice and IP-based telecommunication services in the Mid-Atlantic region, announced that it will present at the following investor conferences in November of 2015: 
Wells Fargo Securities 2015 TMT Conference New York, NY: Wednesday, November 11th, 2015 @ 3:15pm-3:45pmScheduled Presenter: Timothy G. Biltz, President and CEO of Lumos Networks 
Availability for one-on-one investor meetings on November 11, 2015: Timothy G. Biltz, President and CEO Johan Broekhuysen, Executive Vice President and CFO Will Davis, Vice President of Investor Relations and Chief of Staff Jake Miller, Senior Vice President of Business Development 
Jefferies Small and Mid-Cap Communications Summit New York, NY: Wednesday, November 18th, 2015 @ 8:00am-2:30pmThis event includes no formal presentations, only one-on-one and small group meetings. 
Availability for one-on-one investor meetings on November 18, 2015: Timothy G. Biltz, President and CEO Johan Broekhuysen, Executive Vice President and CFO Will Davis, Vice President of Investor Relations and Chief of Staff Jake Miller, Senior Vice President of Business Development 
Please contact your respective salespeople from Wells Fargo Securities and Jefferies for further information. 
About Lumos Networks 
Lumos Networks is a leading fiber-based service provider in the Mid-Atlantic region serving Carrier, Enterprise and Data Center customers, offering end-to-end connectivity in 24 markets in Virginia, Pennsylvania, West Virginia, Maryland, Ohio and Kentucky. With a fiber network of 8,100 fiber route miles and over 369,000 total fiber strand miles, Lumos Networks connects 976 unique Fiber-to-the-Cell sites, 1,307 total FTTC connections, 33 data centers, 1,574 on-net buildings and over 2,560 total on-net locations. In 2014, Lumos Networks generated over $106 million in data revenue over our fiber network. Detailed information about Lumos Networks is available at www.lumosnetworks.com .
